robertdahl wrote:
> 
> Megatron snickered a sarcastic snicker.  "What a fool...You call I,

OOC: Okay, I don't know what is going on here, but I did not write this
post above. I don't know what happened, but I was not on the computer at
the time of this post, and that is not my writting style. Although I
enjoyed both Northlight and Gunther's posts that responded to it, this
one was weak, and pathetic, and sounded nothing like Megatron, so if it
is all right with Gunther and Northlight, I would like to turn back the
weels of time, as I never wrote this, and would like to respond in my
own way. Could both of you e-mail me and give me the O K
